text: Nabiyow Sinaamak Yallaa kee koo Nummayse marah Qadaawatah gidibuk Raqtam yahuud kee Yallat Agleytit haa mara kinnim keenik geetto, diggah Nabiyow yeemeneh yan marah kacanuh xayuk Raaqa mari diggah nanu Nasaara iyye mara kinnim keenik geetto, woh kah kinnim diggah keenik isi diinih ixxiga le maraa kee Qibaada keenik Abita mari keenit yaniimi, diggah usun cakkik makaxxa mariinitan
